attributes.action: Ban fireworks Only Use them for displays only not for personal use
attributes.additional_details: because firework upsets people with autism and kills Pets and  Wildlife gives them heart attack it needs too be stop at all cause no more of this pets and wildlife are dying needs too be STOP RIGHT NOW
attributes.background: Ban Fireworks display use only not for personal use

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
